vitest.name: vitest
vitest.description: Vitest fast unit testing framework powered by Vite with Jest-compatible API. Use when writing tests, mocking, configuring coverage, or working with test filtering and fixtures.

pinned-tag.name: pinned-tag
pinned-tag.description: Skill for managing "pinned tags" and commit SHAs, primarily for GitHub Actions security. Trigger: When fixing "Unpinned tag for a non-immutable Action" warnings or when pinning dependencies to specific git versions.
